selfIntroduce.title: Hello, I'm
selfIntroduce.1:
I'm Yuul, a Full End Developer with over 4 years of experience in
the web application field. In addition to my expertise in frontend
development, I am also keenly interested in exploring other
programming languages such as Python, C# and Java.
selfIntroduce.2:
I aslo have experience with backend development, including
frameworks like .NET, Spring Boot, and Django, I am also skilled
in SQL, which supports my capability to work across both frontend
and backend development.
selfIntroduce.3:
Currently, I am working on a new project focused on a vehicle
renting system. This role has exposed me to various workflows and
development methodologies. I am grateful for the opportunity to
collaborate with such professional colleagues, as it has
significantly contributed to my personal and professional growth.

1.description: As a Full-stack engineer, my responsibilities include planning architecture, UI/UX design, SQL, RESTful API design, and using GitLab as version control.

2.description:
I work as an assistant at IBM Consulting Company, and participate in the development of project.
 The ratio of front-end and back-end is 70:30.

1.title: Language Specialist
1.description:
Despite rarely studying proactively, I have acquired listening and speaking skills in both Japanese and English through films and television shows.
I can engage in daily conversations with native speakers and understand approximately 70% of foreign language content.

2.title: Programming language learning ability
2.description:
During my time at Hiwin Technologies,
I began project development just two months after starting to learn web technologies and JavaScript,
despite having no prior experience.
Additionally, in both of my previous jobs, 
I was able to understand backend development and architecture through self-exploration and observing others. 
I then proceeded to take part in backend development, all within a short span of one to two months.

3.title: Technical research
3.description:
I enjoy keeping up with current technology trends and development progress. 
Staying updated on things like Angular and TypeScript version changes, 
or exploring new ways to use AI, has become a part of my daily routine.

1.title: 滾珠螺桿參數選型介面開發
1.description: 開發公司官網的滾珠螺桿客製化參數選取，可以自行設定型號、零件長寬等參數。

2.title: 弱電工程每日工程排工系統
2.description:
執行內容：
● 開發施工項目設定檔編輯、工程料號對應設定檔選取作業，當排工人員選取工程時，會自動帶出設定檔，可知曉此次工程需要作業、驗收內容。
● 提供PrimeNG日曆套件，提供排工人員可以簡易檢視每日工程安排狀況，並安排新的工程作業。
● 作業內容可全部自定義內容，並且可快速檢視排工概況進行工程追蹤、檢討。
《效益》
1. 節省整體作業時間50%。
2. 提供日曆快速安排、檢視每日排工，追蹤進度。
